name: DBT
description: Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT) is a type of cognitive-behavioral therapy that focuses on developing skills to manage emotions, build relationships, and cope with distress. These cards offer practical exercises to develop emotional regulation, interpersonal effectiveness, and distress tolerance.

cards.title: TIPP Skills
cards.description: Temperature, Intense exercise, Paced breathing, Paired muscle relaxation
cards.instructions: Use cold temperature or exercise to reduce emotional intensity

cards.title: STOP Skill
cards.description: Stop, Take a step back, Observe, Proceed mindfully
cards.instructions: Practice stopping and observing before acting on urges

cards.title: Wise Mind ACCEPTS
cards.description: Activities, Contributing, Comparisons, Emotions, Pushing away, Thoughts, Sensations
cards.instructions: Choose and practice one ACCEPTS strategy for current situation

cards.title: Self-Soothing
cards.description: Use five senses to self-soothe during distress
cards.instructions: Create list of soothing activities for each sense

cards.title: IMPROVE Skills
cards.description: Imagery, Meaning, Prayer, Relaxation, One thing, Vacation, Encouragement
cards.instructions: Practice using IMPROVE skills during difficult moments

cards.title: Radical Acceptance
cards.description: Accept reality as it is without fighting it
cards.instructions: Practice accepting a difficult situation without trying to change it

cards.title: Crisis Survival Strategies
cards.description: Develop personalized crisis plan
cards.instructions: Create list of go-to strategies for different crisis situations

cards.title: Pros and Cons
cards.description: Evaluate consequences of actions vs. using skills
cards.instructions: List pros/cons of acting on urges vs. using coping skills

cards.title: Distraction Plan
cards.description: Create structured distraction activities
cards.instructions: Develop categorized list of healthy distractions

cards.title: Willingness vs. Willfulness
cards.description: Practice accepting reality with willingness
cards.instructions: Identify areas of willfulness and practice willingness

cards.title: Check the Facts
cards.description: Examine evidence for emotional interpretations
cards.instructions: Identify emotion-triggering thoughts and evaluate their accuracy

cards.title: PLEASE Skills
cards.description: Treat PhysicaL illness, balanced Eating, avoid mood-Altering drugs, balanced Sleep, get Exercise
cards.instructions: Rate current PLEASE skills and choose one to improve

cards.title: Opposite Action
cards.description: Act opposite to emotion urges when appropriate
cards.instructions: Identify emotion urge and practice opposite behavior

cards.title: ABC PLEASE
cards.description: Accumulate positive experiences, Build mastery, Cope ahead
cards.instructions: Plan activities for positive experiences and skill building

cards.title: Emotion Awareness
cards.description: Identify and label current emotions
cards.instructions: Track emotions, triggers, and body sensations throughout day

cards.title: Reduce Vulnerability
cards.description: Identify and change factors increasing emotional sensitivity
cards.instructions: List vulnerability factors and develop management strategies

cards.title: Problem Solving
cards.description: Apply problem-solving to emotion-triggering situations
cards.instructions: Use DBT problem-solving steps for emotional challenge

cards.title: Mindfulness of Emotions
cards.description: Observe and describe emotions without judgment
cards.instructions: Practice observing emotions like waves coming and going

cards.title: Values Clarity
cards.description: Connect emotional responses to personal values
cards.instructions: Identify values underlying emotional reactions

cards.title: Emotion Myths
cards.description: Challenge common misconceptions about emotions
cards.instructions: Examine and reality-test beliefs about emotions

cards.title: DEAR MAN Skills
cards.description: Describe, Express, Assert, Reinforce, Mindful, Appear confident, Negotiate
cards.instructions: Practice DEAR MAN for a specific request

cards.title: GIVE Skills
cards.description: Gentle, Interest, Validate, Easy manner
cards.instructions: Role-play using GIVE skills in conversation

cards.title: FAST Skills
cards.description: Fair, Apologies (no excessive), Stick to values, Truthful
cards.instructions: Apply FAST skills to maintain self-respect

cards.title: Validation Practice
cards.description: Learn to validate others' emotions and experiences
cards.instructions: Practice six levels of validation

cards.title: Priority Analysis
cards.description: Balance objectives, relationships, and self-respect
cards.instructions: Evaluate priorities in current interpersonal situation

cards.title: Boundary Setting
cards.description: Establish and maintain healthy boundaries
cards.instructions: Identify and practice expressing personal boundaries

cards.title: Active Listening
cards.description: Improve listening and understanding skills
cards.instructions: Practice reflective listening techniques

cards.title: Relationship Repair
cards.description: Skills for mending relationship ruptures
cards.instructions: Apply repair strategies to current conflict

cards.title: Communication Styles
cards.description: Identify passive, aggressive, and assertive patterns
cards.instructions: Practice shifting between communication styles

cards.title: Problem-Solving Dialog
cards.description: Collaborative problem-solving in relationships
cards.instructions: Use structured dialog for interpersonal problems
